price: Ese babangikanya (Allah) n’ibitagira icyo birema, kandi na byo ubwabyo byararemwe?
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
